name: MBlue Simple-Gray Slim-Extension
description:
Description:
 Makes the Extension-Windows integrate better with the Simple-Gray
 Theme, and makes the Extension list slim.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Supported Extensions:
 All-in-One Sidebar.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Notes:
 You can use the "Simple-Gray Sidebar" style to open the
 Estension-window inside the sidebar (need AIOS).

 Some features of AIOS (or even other Extensions) may cause a few
 small issues.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Integrates with:
 MBlue Simple-Gray Theme
 MBlue Simple-Gray Theme Ext-Support
 MBlue Simple-Gray Sidebar
 MBlue Simple-Gray Sidebar Ext-Support
 MBlue Simple-Gray Slim-Download
 MBlue Simple-Gray Top-Toolbar
 MBlue Simple-Gray Popup
 MBlue Combine Nav-Buttons Vista
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Updates:
 27.07.2008 Ver. 0.3.5 = new version
 11.07.2008 Ver. 0.2.0 = fixed notification margins
 10.07.2008 Ver. 0.1.9 = code optimized
  8.07.2008 Ver. 0.1.8 = released
